name: tm70
effect: Teaches Flash to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flash to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user flashes a light that cuts the foe’s accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.
flavor_text.platinum: The user flashes a light that cuts the foe’s accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user flashes a light that cuts the foe’s accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.
